# [Interview #843: Charleston City Paper (Cover Story), Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=843#15)

#### M. L. Van Valkenburgh

Finally, Jordan has some advice for aspiring writers.

#### Robert Jordan

"Write, submit, talk. Nothing counts unless you do it. Do your research."
